title: Silence and Shadow
author: Erin Beaty
description:
After confronting a killer and fleeing her home to be with each other, Cat and Simon arrive in the sprawling city of Londunium pretending to be a newly married couple, but don’t expect to keep up the ruse for long. Cat looks forward to honing her healing magick at the local Selanae university, but instead finds a council of ruthless leaders threatening to erase her non-Selanae "husband’s" memories to protect their secrets.

Terrified to lose him, Cat takes desperate steps to keep him safe. But when a string of mutilated bodies turns up in the woods outside the city, and Simon is recruited to profile the killer, Cat is pulled back into a world of murder, mayhem, and magick—one that threatens to swallow them both.

title: Los Crímenes de Steamfield
author: Alberto Rey
description: La ciudad de Steamfield es testigo de dos acontecimientos sin precedentes para esta tranquila comunidad: la sucesión de una serie de muertes sin explicación aparente y la aparición de una oscura y densa niebla que se extiende por toda la ciudad. En medio de esta situación, el joven Andrew Anderson recibe una oportunidad soñada que, sin pretenderlo, le empujará hacia una emocionante búsqueda para esclarecer estos hechos. Por suerte, contará con dos nuevos amigos que le acompañarán en esta aventura.
coverImage: /images/books/The Crimes of Steamfield by Alberto Rey.jpeg

title: Creator's Call
author: Costas Ioannou
description: Eighteen-year-old Edward has been raised with tales of distant lands where dragons and other strange beasts dwell. He dreams of one day joining the Keepers, who fight against them to keep the land safe; however, life’s obstacles keep him firmly rooted in the small town of Cadestone. When seventeen-year-old June comes passing through, following a dream given to her by the Creator of the universe, Edward’s life is about to change. Pursued by a demon-possessed man, the two of them are forced to flee to areas where dragons and monsters are not just tales but reality. June and Edward eventually discover what the demons want from them. Is it possible to defeat this evil and save everyone from the darkness that threatens their lands?

title: Anya and the Nightingale
author: Sofiya Pasternack
description: The adventure continues in this sequel to Anya and the Dragon, in which a dangerous monster lurks beneath the city and only Anya can prevent him from taking her friends’ magic—and their lives. Set in Kievan Rus’, this story follows Anya as she confronts new threats, protects those she cares about, and faces challenges that will test her courage and determination.
coverImage: /images/books/Anya and the Nightingale by Sofia Pasternack.jpeg

title: Realm of Ruins
author: Hannah West
description: A century after her legendary ancestors overcame a bloodthirsty tyrant, seventeen-year-old Valory Braiosa trains among the elicromancers, immortal beings with magical gifts. But her own power is dangerous, unruly, and nearly impossible to control. When a forbidden resurrection spell awakens an ancient evil, Valory may be the only one capable of stopping it. Joined by a band of allies—including an old friend, a proud princess, and a mysterious stranger—she must learn to harness her magic before darkness consumes the realm.

title: Horizon
author: Fran Wilde
description: As the living Bone towers collapse and catastrophe spreads, Kirit Densira struggles to survive after losing her mother, her home, and the skies she once knew. Nat Brokenwings—once like a brother to her before rebellion tore them apart—fights to protect his family amid the same devastation. To save themselves and their fractured community, Kirit and Nat must unite again as danger closes in from all sides.

title: Remarkables
author: Margaret Peterson Haddix
description: Marin, lonely after moving to a new town, becomes obsessed with the mysterious teens who appear and disappear next door—happy, laughing, and seemingly impossible. When she meets Charley, who also sees them and calls them the Remarkables, he warns her to stay away from both them and him. As Marin and Charley confront their own painful secrets, the mystery of the Remarkables might be the key to healing, understanding, and the truth behind what they are witnessing.

title: The Floating World
author: Axie Oh
description: Sunho, an ex-soldier living in the Under World with no memories of his past, takes on a mission to hunt down a girl who wields silver light. Far away, Ren—an acrobat traveling with her adoptive family—reveals her hidden power when a humanlike demon attacks their village, but not in time to prevent a devastating loss. Determined to save her wounded uncle, she sets off toward the mountains she fled years ago. Her journey puts her on a collision course with Sunho, unaware that she is the very girl he and countless other mercenaries are chasing. As they travel together, their connection deepens, and they begin to uncover the intertwined paths and destinies that bind them far more deeply than they imagined.

title: The Demon and the Light
author: Axie Oh
description: With the Floating World under threat from the Volmaran Empire and Sunho lost to the monstrous power in his blood, Ren must navigate the dangerous royal court while searching for him. Seen by some as a savior and by others as a pawn, she must survive political manipulation, war, and her own grief before Sunho loses himself to the Demon forever.
